title: Cant update league (patch 7.15)
body:
https://scontent.fhmo1-1.fna.fbcdn.net/v/t34.0-12/20401175_1528588660495354_373466712_n.png?oh=5d34e4ec4cafc905b6130df0bac6eea9&oe=597B9345  

i keep getting this error that i dont have enough space and i need atleast 8gb, i currently only have 1gb left out of 74.5gb and i cant find anything else to delete to make room. league is the "biggest" file i have with aprox 6gb. when i go to update league it says x/206.6mb wich means i only need 206mb wich ik i have room for that, then i get that error. idk what to do if its really 8gb then i guess ill nvr be able to play league again witch is sad {{item:3070}} what should i do? (no i cant delete any other folders, i dont have anything else to delete trust me )


Edit: if you cant open image then right click and click on "open image in new tab"
if you still cant open it then it preety much says what im saying PLUS error code 002

Edit 2: now it says 175.7 mb... after 4 times of restarting this update (yes i always wait until it gives me this error :(    )

Edit #???? : finnaly fixed after runiing hextech repair tool and turning off firewall :)

replies.body: Ayyyyyy glad you were finally able to get it going! League sometimes needs to add more files than usual before it goes back and wipes away the unused files, so you may need to try deleting some unused program to make a little more room if that happens next patch.
